heroDesc: Helping teams deliver better software with advanced test automation, QA strategy, and mentoring.
about1: With years of experience in QA automation and testing strategy, I help businesses improve their software quality, reduce release cycles, and implement efficient automation solutions.
about2: I also provide mentoring and workshops to help QA engineers and teams upgrade their skills.

offer.title: Test Automation
offer.desc: Custom Cypress & Playwright solutions tailored to your needs.

offer.title: Mentorship
offer.desc: 1:1 guidance for QA beginners and professionals.

offer.title: Workshops
offer.desc: Hands-on training and bootcamps for teams or individuals.
